author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

Add step2 and step3 to the test chain of standard workflows using DD4hep as input. Please note that at this point the proposed steps are nothing but the output of ```runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -l 11607.0 --command "--geometry DD4hepExtended2021 --era Run3_dd4hep" ```. 

#### PR validation:

The steps fail, as known, but they can be routinely used to test progresses and issues. A dryRun of the suggested matrix command above shows that the cmsDriver commands generated are those in the script, as desired.
title: DD4hep geometry test: update dd4hep tentative workflow
